report.title: Record data for record details
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the record details 2 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences co join occurrences o on o.id=co.id and o.deleted=false join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=co.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id join users u on u.id=o.created_by_id join people p on p.id=u.person_id #agreements_join# #joins# where co.id=#occurrence_id#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

column.name: taxon
column.sql: case co.zero_abundance when true then '<span class="zero-abundance">' || co.taxon || '<span> - zero abundance found' else co.taxon end

column.name: preferred_taxon
column.sql: CASE co.preferred_taxon WHEN co.taxon THEN null ELSE co.preferred_taxon END

column.name: inputter
column.sql: case p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end when co.recorders then null else p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end end

column.name: record_status
column.sql:
CASE co.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Awaiting verification' WHEN 'I' THEN 'Data entry in progress' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Email query sent' END || CASE WHEN o.sensitivity_precision IS NOT NULL THEN '
This record is sensitive.' ELSE '' END

column.name: sample_comment
column.sql: case when o.sensitivity_precision is null then s.comment else null end
